biweekly.io

Class TzUrlDotOrgGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • biweekly.io.TzUrlDotOrgGenerator

  • public class TzUrlDotOrgGenerator
extends Object
    Downloads VTimezone components from tzurl.org. This class is thread-safe.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TzUrlDotOrgGenerator(boolean outlookCompatible)
      Creates a new tzurl.org generator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void clearCache()
      Clears the internal cache of downloaded timezone definitions.
      VTimezone generate(TimeZone timezone)
      Generates an iCalendar VTimezone components from a Java TimeZone object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TzUrlDotOrgGenerator

        public TzUrlDotOrgGenerator(boolean outlookCompatible)
        Creates a new tzurl.org generator.
        Parameters:
        outlookCompatible - true to download VTimezone components that are tailored for Microsoft Outlook email clients, false to download standards-based ones

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public VTimezone generate(TimeZone timezone)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Generates an iCalendar VTimezone components from a Java TimeZone object.
        Parameters:
        timezone - the timezone object
        Returns:
        the timezone component
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a timezone definition cannot be found

      • clearCache

        public static void clearCache()
        Clears the internal cache of downloaded timezone definitions.
